sql.content: SELECT A.table_Name AS nameDB ,B.column_Name AS "tableColumns.name" ,B.data_Type AS "tableColumns.typeDB" ,B.data_Length AS "tableColumns.length" ,CASE B.nullAble WHEN 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS "tableColumns.nullAble" ,( SELECT SA.comments FROM User_Col_Comments SA WHERE SA.table_Name = B.table_Name AND SA.column_Name = B.column_Name ) AS "tableColumns.description" FROM User_Tables A ,User_Tab_Columns B WHERE A.table_Name = B.table_Name ORDER BY A.table_Name ,B.column_id

SELECT A.name AS nameDB ,B.name AS "tableColumns.name" ,C.name AS "tableColumns.typeDB" ,B.max_length AS "tableColumns.length" ,B.is_nullable AS "tableColumns.nullAble" ,( SELECT SA.value FROM sys.extended_properties SA WHERE SA.major_id = B.object_id AND SA.minor_id = B.column_id ) AS "tableColumns.description" FROM sys.tables A ,sys.columns B ,sys.systypes C WHERE A.object_id = B.object_id AND B.user_type_id = C.xusertype ORDER BY A.name ,B.column_id
